taskTitle: Add pi-mono context compaction/backpressure for long sessions

subtasks.description:
Add pi-mono context compaction/backpressure for long sessions

Port pi-mono's context compaction/backpressure to MechaCoder session manager so long-running runs trim history intelligently (keep tools/prompts relevant, drop noise) and avoid provider token overruns. Include tests/fixtures mirroring pi-mono behavior.
